I am a Ph.D. student in <span style="color:#011F5B;">**Applied Economics**</span> at <span style="color:#011F5B;">**The Wharton School**</span>, <span style="color:#011F5B;">**University of Pennsylvania**</span>. 

You can either call me <span style="color:#011F5B;">**Hyoungchul (H-Young-Cheol, rhymes with "Null")**</span> or <span style="color:#011F5B;">**Kent (my english name)**</span>.

I am currently interested in urban and environmental topics using tools from international trade and industrial organization.

For inquiries about software, email me or use the issue tracker at github.
